content: I am sorry if this is in the wrong forum or has been asked before (I ran the search feature before I posted). I am looking for photos to include in a slide show that I will present at my church. Since these photos will be shown in public they need to be public domain or I must have the permission of the person or site that posted them. Does anyone know how to message any of the contributors to the "Shock and Awe" Section of this website? Thanks in advance for your help.

content: quote: Originally posted by godsgrayce: As for Honoring our fallen in a Church...Where shouldn't we Honor them? My church often uses powerpoint ~ and always honors our Soldiers!! Check out the “DC thread” at the top of the board. Also see the thread “Pictures of the Troops” and the “PGR” threads (there are three; do a search for the others). Past “Memorial Day” threads have photos of various events as well. Once you create your slide-show it would be nice to see what you came up with so I’m requesting you post it. most of my videos are here: www.youtube.com/user/MissMisunderstood11 Sort by “title” ~ they’re in random order. You have my permission to use what you want!! most are put to Christian rock music. . . Below are links of some posted here on milcom: Marines in Iraq #02 Marines in Iraq #03 Marines in Iraq #04 Marines in Iraq #05 Marines in Iraq #06 Marines in Iraq #07 (music by Blind Mike) we will NEVER forget! (09/11 video) A sticker for the U.S. Marines (long but well worth your time; grab a tissue!!) Welcome Home!! Remember Me by Lizzie Palmar choose joy each day
quote: Originally posted by godsgrayce: As for Honoring our fallen in a Church...Where shouldn't we Honor them?
reply: My church often uses powerpoint ~ and always honors our Soldiers!! Check out the “DC thread” at the top of the board. Once you create your slide-show it would be nice to see what you came up with so I’m requesting you post it. most of my videos are here: www.youtube.com/user/MissMisunderstood11 Sort by “title” ~ they’re in random order. You have my permission to use what you want!! most are put to Christian rock music. . .
